name: Spread the Love (AnizyArt)
description:
Your job is to spread love to the insects that have been consumed by hate. You built a plane that shoots out weaponised love.

The bigger your plane is, the more you can shoot! Spread the love to all the insects before your plane runs out of fuel!

SPREAD THE LOVE is a vertical shooter with bullet hell vibes where you can change the size of your hitbox. It's about shooting, dodging and getting more powerful as the player progresses. You must defeat each boss to advance to the next level and upgrade your stats to get further ahead until you reach the end.

Controls:
  • WASD / Arrow keys - Movement
  • Left Mouse Button / N - Get Bigger
  • Right Mouse Button / M - Get Smaller
  • Esc / Spacebar - Pause/Unpause Game
Credits:

Sounds from:

  • https://www.kenney.nl
  • https://getsoundly.com

Music is "Melody loop 128 bmp" by DaveJf:

  • https://freesound.org/people/DaveJf/sounds/642310

Game/Art/Code by AnizyArt

Font made myself using Calligraphr

Download the stand-alone build!

If you don't want to play on the browser, you can download the stand-alone build to play it as an executable instead :D

Thanks for playing my game!
